version_description: - Minor fixes

- Reach a new planet by driving so hard that the ball leaves the earth orbit !
- New characters to unlock
- Obstacles are now destructible (including those poor birds in the sky...)
- Added night and sunset themes
- Minor Bug fixes
- ... and a little surprise
New feature: Special Balls in the clubhouse with cool powers! Come try these out!

5 cool new characters to unlock!
Plus some minor bug fixes and tweaks.
Have fun!

5 cool new characters to unlock!
Plus some minor bug fixes and tweaks.
Have fun!

- You can now buy 100.000 golds for the tiny price of 100 gems!
- As we make sure to listen to users feedback we reworked the Jackpot outcomes and odds to make it way more interesting!
- Plus some little bug fixes
We hope that you'll have an awesome time playing!

- New planet and new characters !
- iPhone X optimization
- Plus some little bug fixes
We hope that you'll have an awesome time playing!

Solved an issue that prevented the sounds to be heard and solved a few little bugs.
Have fun!

Reworked the interface of the game and solved a few bugs.
We hope you like makeover!

Have fun!

bug fix and optimisations

We fixed some issues with language detection (in addition you can now select your language in the settings menu).
We reworked how stats are reset when going back on a completed planet for a friendlier user experience.
Have fun!

Minor bug fixes and balancing tweaks.
We hope you have fun!

We solved some tricky bugs, mainly one that caused localisation issues.
We also prepared a little Christmas surprise...
Thanks for playing Golf Orbit!
